name: Freyr
description:
Freyr (Old Norse: Frey, Nordic: ᚠᚱᛅᚢᛦ), also known as Freyr Njördson (Translation: Freyr, Son of Njörd) and Yngvi, is the Vanir God of Rain and Fertility. He is the son of Njörd and Nerthus, the younger twin brother of Freya, and the uncle of Baldur.
He is introduced in God of War: Ragnarök as a supportive character. Freyr is the charming leader of the Vanir resistance against the Asgardians, he eventually crosses the path of Kratos and Mimir as the two of them travelled to Vanaheim in order to help Freya break Odin's hold on her.

biographicalInformation.status: Deceased (Sacrified himself by fending off Ragnarök to save Kratos and the others)
